alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Hardee; Highlands; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 30 at 4:23AM EST until January 31 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26. For the Freeze Watch, temperatures as low as 32 possible. * WHERE...Polk, Hardee, Highlands and DeSoto Counties. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, until 9 AM EST this morning. For the Freeze Watch, from late tonight through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
